summary: A young teenager camping in the woods helps rescue the President of the United States when Air Force One is shot down near his campsite.
cast: Samuel L. Jackson|Onni Tommila|Ray Stevenson|Victor Garber|Mehmet Kurtulus|Ted Levine|Jorma Tommila|Risto Salmi|Felicity Huffman|Jim Broadbent|Rauno Juvonen|Jaymes Butler|Jason Steffan|Jean-Luc Julien|Erik Markus Schuetz|Moe Abbas|Adrian Can|Philipp Rafferty|Gabriel Raab|Peter Nitzsche|Lincoln Potwin|Murali Perumal|Ken Thomas|Jörg Witte|Stephan Buschmann|André Kolbe|James Miller
title: Caza mayor
